title: To Kill a Mockingbird
review: A compelling, heart-wrenching, and wholly remarkable tale of coming-of-age in a South poisoned by virulent prejudice.

title: Dune
review: A stunning blend of adventure and mysticism, environmentalism and politics.

title: The Hobbit
review: A wonderfully imaginative story that has delighted children and adults alike for generations.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
review: A spellbinding amalgam of murder mystery, family saga, love story, and financial intrigue.

title: The Book Thief
review: A poignant, moving, and beautifully written novel that is heart-breaking and uplifting in equal measure.

title: Pride and Prejudice
review: A classic tale of love and values that unfolds in the class-conscious England of the late 18th century.

title: Gone Girl
review: A gripping psychological thriller that explores the complexities of marriage and the dark side of human nature.

title: Steve Jobs
review: A riveting biography of the brilliant and controversial co-founder of Apple Inc., providing an unparalleled look at his life and career.

title: The Book Thief
review: A poignant, moving, and beautifully written novel that is heart-breaking and uplifting in equal measure.
